Text:
Thanks very much for this audio. If anyone has The Weavers' 1982 video, "Wasn't That a Time" about the events leading up to the Carnegie Hall reunion concert, please post it.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0084894/
I have it on VHS (recorded from PBS) but the transfer would be.... sub-par
A sub-par transfer would be better than nothing. :)
